    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdateApplication

        @Deprecated
public ApplicationResponse addOrUpdateApplication(Long accountId,
                                                    String appKey,
                                                    String appName,
                                                    String about,
                                                    String bundleId,
                                                    String certificateFilePath,
                                                    String appIconFilePath,
                                                    String appLogoFilePath,
                                                    String facebookAppId,
                                                    String facebookAppSecret,
                                                    Boolean updateEULADate,
                                                    String eulaVersion,
                                                    String landingPageUrl,
                                                    Boolean showInActivities,
                                                    String activityDescription,
                                                    String inviteWelcomeText,
                                                    String invitePageUrl,
                                                    List<Enums.PlatformType> platforms,
                                                    List<Long> categoryIds,
                                                    Enums.ScoringType scoringType,
                                                    Integer hintCost,
                                                    Integer maxScore,
                                                    Float ticketsPerPoint,
                                                    Boolean hasGameData,
                                                    Boolean globalTickets,
                                                    Float buildVersion,
                                                    Float apiVersion,
                                                    Enums.ResponseFormat responseFormat)
                                           throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. 
        Create or update an application record. If the appKey is provided and valid then the record will be updated, otherwise a new record will be created. Each developer group can only create 10 applications.

        Target API Endpoint: /application
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        appKey - Your application key
        appName - The name of the application
        about - The description of the application
        bundleId - The application bundle identifier (format - com.company.appName)
        certificateFilePath - The Apple Push Notification certificate file path
        appIconFilePath - the application icon file path
        appLogoFilePath - the application logo file path
        facebookAppId - the facebook application id
        facebookAppSecret - the facebook application secret
        updateEULADate - Determines whether to update the EULA date
        eulaVersion - the EULA version
        landingPageUrl - the landing page url
        showInActivities - Determines whether to show the application in the activity feed
        activityDescription - The description of the application in the activity feed
        inviteWelcomeText - The text to display on the invite page
        invitePageUrl - the invite page url
        platforms - List of platforms supported, possible values are:
        MAC, WINDOWS, IOS, ANDROID, WINDOWSPHONE, KINDLE, UNITY3D, HTML5, FACEBOOK
        categoryIds - List of categories to apply
        scoringType - The type of scoring this application will use {GAME_LEVEL, GAME_OBJECT}
        hintCost - The cost of hints
        maxScore - The maximum score that will be possible
        ticketsPerPoint - The point-to-ticket conversion ratio
        hasGameData - Determines whether the application uses services to save custom game objects
        globalTickets - Determines whether earned tickets are applied across all applications
        buildVersion - The current build version of the application
        apiVersion - The current API version the application uses
        responseFormat - The format of the returned response {JSON // default , HTML // for Dojo support when uploading assets}
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse if failed, otherwise a ApplicationResponse with the generated information
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • createApplication

        public ApplicationResponse createApplication(Long accountId,
                                    String appName,
                                    String about,
                                    String bundleId,
                                    Long appIconAssetId,
                                    Long appLogoAssetId,
                                    String facebookAppId,
                                    String facebookAppSecret,
                                    String googleApiKey,
                                    Boolean updateEULADate,
                                    String eulaVersion,
                                    String landingPageUrl,
                                    Boolean showInActivities,
                                    String activityDescription,
                                    String inviteWelcomeText,
                                    String invitePageUrl,
                                    String platforms,
                                    List<Long> categoryIds,
                                    Enums.ScoringType scoringType,
                                    Integer hintCost,
                                    Integer maxScore,
                                    Float ticketsPerPoint,
                                    Boolean hasGameData,
                                    Boolean publicNotifications,
                                    Boolean useMatchingAlgorithm,
                                    Boolean globalTickets,
                                    Float buildVersion,
                                    Float apiVersion,
                                    String placementName,
                                    String placementDescription,
                                    Enums.AdSize placementSize,
                                    Integer placementHeight,
                                    Integer placementWidth,
                                    Integer placementRefreshInterval)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Create an application record and one placement record for that application. You can create more placements for this application by using createApplicationPlacement. Each developer group can only create 10 applications.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        appName - The name of the application
        about - The description of the application
        bundleId - The application bundle identifier (format - com.company.appName)
        appIconAssetId - The application icon asset id
        appLogoAssetId - The application logo asset id
        facebookAppId - The Facebook application id
        facebookAppSecret - The Facebook application secret
        googleApiKey - This is the either the "server key" or "browser key" generated from google to enable Google Cloud Messaging
        updateEULADate - Determines whether to update the EULA date
        eulaVersion - The EULA version
        landingPageUrl - The landing page URL
        showInActivities - Determines whether to show the application in the activity feed
        activityDescription - The description of the application in the activity feed
        inviteWelcomeText - The text to display on the invite page
        invitePageUrl - The url to the application invite page
        platforms - A json object with a list of supported platforms. 
         
 {platforms:[{
                'deviceId':1,
                'minimum':230,
                'maximum':421,
                'downloadUrl':'http://app.store.com/download',
                'description':'description and version info'
 }]}
        the minumum and maximum version values the version numbers with the dots removed and right padded with 0 up to a 3 digit long value.
        categoryIds - List of categories to apply
        scoringType - The type of scoring this application will use {GAME_LEVEL, GAME_OBJECT}
        hintCost - The cost of hints
        maxScore - The maximum score that will be possible
        ticketsPerPoint - The point-to-ticket conversion ratio
        hasGameData - Determines whether the application uses services to save custom game objects
        publicNotifications - the public notifications
        useMatchingAlgorithm - the use matching algorithm
        globalTickets - Determines whether earned tickets are applied across all applications
        buildVersion - The current build version of the application
        apiVersion - The current API version the application uses
        placementName - The name of the placement
        placementDescription - The description of the placement
        placementSize - The ad placement size {BANNER, LEADERBOARD, SKYSCRAPER, INTERSTITIAL, CUSTOM} (this is required if a placements is to be created)
        placementHeight - The height of a custom ad size
        placementWidth - The width of a custom ad size
        placementRefreshInterval - The refresh interval in seconds
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse if failed, otherwise a ApplicationResponse with the generated information
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • createApplicationPlacement

        public WrappedResponse<PlacementResponse> createApplicationPlacement(Long accountId,
                                                            String appKey,
                                                            String name,
                                                            String description,
                                                            Enums.AdSize size,
                                                            Integer height,
                                                            Integer width,
                                                            Integer refreshInterval)
                                                              throws SirqulException
        Creates a new ad placement for an application.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/placement/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        appKey - the application key the ad placement is for.
        name - The name of the placement
        description - The description of the placement
        size - The ad placement size {BANNER, LEADERBOARD, SKYSCRAPER, INTERSTITIAL, CUSTOM}
        height - The height of a custom ad size
        width - The width of a custom ad size
        refreshInterval - The refresh interval in seconds
        Returns:
        WrappedResponse<PlacementResponse> on success, SirqulResponse on failure.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getApplication

        public ApplicationResponse getApplication(String appKey)
                                   throws SirqulException
        Get a specifc application by appKey

        Target API Endpoint: /application/get.
        Parameters:
        appKey - The key of the application to get
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success ApplicationResponse
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getApplicationList

        public ListResponse<ApplicationShortResponse> getApplicationList(Long accountId,
                                                        String keyword,
                                                        List<Enums.PlatformType> platforms,
                                                        List<String> deviceIds,
                                                        List<String> deviceVersions,
                                                        List<Long> categoryIds,
                                                        Enums.ApplicationApiMap sortField,
                                                        Boolean hasAds,
                                                        Boolean publicNotifications,
                                                        Boolean filterBillable,
                                                        Boolean descending,
                                                        Integer start,
                                                        Integer limit,
                                                        List<Long> applicationIds)
                                                          throws SirqulException
        Gets the application list.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/list
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the application owner/manager
        keyword - The keyword used to search for title, about, and description fields
        platforms - Deprecated, use deviceIds and deviceVersions
        deviceIds - The list of targeted device ids, comma separated; possible values are retreived via /audience/devices (pass in deviceId values)
        deviceVersions - The list of targeted device version ranges that are aligned with the provided devices list (see devices param for possible values), comma separated; examples are:
        2.3-X, 0-5.1.4, 4.3.1-6.1.4 where X is no maximum and 0 is no minimum.
        categoryIds - The list of category ids to filter the list by
        sortField - The column to sort the search on, possible values include: UPDATED (default), CREATED, TITLE
        hasAds - Filter results on whether the application supports ads or not. Ignore this parameter to return all results.
        publicNotifications - Filter results on whether the application is available for public trigger notifications
        filterBillable - Determines whether to only return applications that the user has access to
        descending - The order to return the search results
        start - The start of the pagination
        limit - The limit of the pagination
        applicationIds - The list of application ids. If provided will ignore all other params.
        Returns:
        a ListResponse<ApplicationShortResponse> that contains the results
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getApplicationPlacement

        public WrappedResponse<PlacementResponse> getApplicationPlacement(Long accountId,
                                                         Long placementId)
                                                           throws SirqulException
        Get details of an ad placement.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/placement/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        placementId - The id of the placement
        Returns:
        WrappedResponse<PlacementResponse> on success, SirqulResponse on failure.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getApplicationUsers

        public AccountListResponse getApplicationUsers(String appKey,
                                      String keyword,
                                      Long since,
                                      Long start,
                                      Long limit)
                                        throws SirqulException
        Get a list of users per application.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/users
        Parameters:
        appKey - The application key
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        since - return accounts that have been active after this date (UNIX time-stamp in milliseconds)
        start - The start of the pagination
        limit - The limit of the pagination
        Returns:
        a AccountListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getApplicationVersions

        public SirqulResponse getApplicationVersions()
                                      throws SirqulException
        Get the supported Api versions. Will return a comma separated list of numbers, newest first. For example: 3.0, 2.2, 2.1, 1.8

        Target API Endpoint: /application/versions
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeApplication

        public SirqulResponse removeApplication(Long accountId,
                               String appKey)
                                 throws SirqulException
        Set the deleted timestamp to current time. This effectively deletes the application since all queries should ignore any records with a deleted time stamp.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the delete, must have rights to edit the application.
        appKey - The key of the application to be deleted
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeApplicationPlacement

        public SirqulResponse removeApplicationPlacement(Long accountId,
                                        Long placementId)
                                          throws SirqulException
        Sets the ad placement to be removed from the application and effectively deleted by the user.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/placement/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        placementId - The id of the placement to delete, the user must have rights to the application the ad placement is for
        Returns:
        SirqulResponse with success or fail message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchApplicationPlacement

        public SearchResponse<PlacementResponse> searchApplicationPlacement(Long accountId,
                                                           String appKey,
                                                           Integer start,
                                                           Integer limit)
                                                             throws SirqulException
        Searches placements for an application.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/placement/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        appKey - The key of the application
        start - The start of the pagination
        limit - The limit of the pagination
        Returns:
        the SearchResponse<PlacementResponse> on success. SirqulResponse on fail with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchApplications

        public SearchResponse<ApplicationResponse> searchApplications(Long accountId,
                                                     Location location,
                                                     String keyword,
                                                     List<Enums.ApplicationApiMap> keywordSearchFields,
                                                     Enums.ApplicationApiMap sortField,
                                                     Boolean descending,
                                                     Integer start,
                                                     Integer limit,
                                                     Boolean hasAds,
                                                     Boolean publicNotifications,
                                                     Boolean activeOnly)
                                                       throws SirqulException
        Search for applications matching the criteria that the logged in user has access to.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account ID of the logged in user making the request
        location - The location of the device
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        keywordSearchFields - The columns to applied the keyword search to
        sortField - The column to sort the search on
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        hasAds - Filter results on whether the application supports ads or not. Ignore this parameter to return all results.
        publicNotifications - Filter results on whether the application is available for public trigger notifications
        activeOnly - Return only active results
        Returns:
        a SearchResponse<ApplicationResponse> that contains the results, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateApplication

        public ApplicationResponse updateApplication(Long accountId,
                                    String appKey,
                                    String appName,
                                    String about,
                                    String bundleId,
                                    Long appIconAssetId,
                                    Long appLogoAssetId,
                                    String facebookAppId,
                                    String facebookAppSecret,
                                    String googleApiKey,
                                    Boolean updateEULADate,
                                    String eulaVersion,
                                    String landingPageUrl,
                                    Boolean showInActivities,
                                    String activityDescription,
                                    String inviteWelcomeText,
                                    String invitePageUrl,
                                    String platforms,
                                    List<Long> categoryIds,
                                    Enums.ScoringType scoringType,
                                    Integer hintCost,
                                    Integer maxScore,
                                    Float ticketsPerPoint,
                                    Boolean hasGameData,
                                    Boolean publicNotifications,
                                    Boolean useMatchingAlgorithm,
                                    Boolean globalTickets,
                                    Float buildVersion,
                                    Float apiVersion)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Update an application record.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        appKey - The application key for updating an existing application
        appName - The name of the application
        about - The description of the application
        bundleId - The application bundle identifier (format - com.company.appName)
        appIconAssetId - The application icon asset id
        appLogoAssetId - The application logo asset id
        facebookAppId - The Facebook application id
        facebookAppSecret - The Facebook application secret
        googleApiKey - This is the either the "server key" or "browser key" generated from google to enable Google Cloud Messaging
        updateEULADate - Determines whether to update the EULA date
        eulaVersion - The EULA version
        landingPageUrl - The landing page URL
        showInActivities - Determines whether to show the application in the activity feed
        activityDescription - The description of the application in the activity feed
        inviteWelcomeText - The text to display on the invite page
        invitePageUrl - The url to the application invite page
        platforms - A json object with a list of platforms supported.
        {platforms:[{ 'deviceId':1, 'minimum':230, 'maximum':421, 'downloadUrl':'http://app.store.com/download', 'description':'description and version info' }]}
        the minumum and maximum version values the version numbers with the dots removed and right padded with 0 up to a 3 digit long value.
        categoryIds - List of categories to apply
        scoringType - The type of scoring this application will use {GAME_LEVEL, GAME_OBJECT}
        hintCost - The cost of hints
        maxScore - The maximum score that will be possible
        ticketsPerPoint - The point-to-ticket conversion ratio
        hasGameData - Determines whether the application uses services to save custom game objects
        publicNotifications - the public notifications
        useMatchingAlgorithm - the use matching algorithm
        globalTickets - Determines whether earned tickets are applied across all applications
        buildVersion - The current build version of the application
        apiVersion - The current API version the application uses
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse if failed, otherwise a ApplicationResponse with the generated information
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateApplicationActive

        public SirqulResponse updateApplicationActive(Long accountId,
                                     String appKey,
                                     Boolean active)
                                       throws SirqulException
        Set the application's active flag to true/false. This effectively activates or deactivates the application.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/active
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the edit, must have rights to edit the application.
        appKey - the application key
        active - If true then set to active, false otherwise
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateApplicationPlacement

        public WrappedResponse<PlacementResponse> updateApplicationPlacement(Long accountId,
                                                            Long placementId,
                                                            String name,
                                                            String description,
                                                            Enums.AdSize size,
                                                            Integer height,
                                                            Integer width,
                                                            Integer refreshInterval)
                                                              throws SirqulException
        Updates an ad placement.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/placement/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        placementId - The id of the placement to update, the user must have rights to the application the ad placement is for.
        name - The name of the placement
        description - The description of the placement
        size - The ad placement size {BANNER, LEADERBOARD, SKYSCRAPER, INTERSTITIAL, CUSTOM}
        height - The height of a custom ad size
        width - The width of a custom ad size
        refreshInterval - The refresh interval in seconds
        Returns:
        WrappedResponse<PlacementResponse> on success, SirqulResponse on failure.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • uploadApplicationCertificate

        public SirqulResponse uploadApplicationCertificate(Long accountId,
                                          String appKey,
                                          String certificateFilePath)
                                            throws SirqulException
        Update application certificate.

        Target API Endpoint: /application/certificate/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the delete, must have rights to edit the application.
        appKey - the key of the application
        certificateFilePath - The Apple Push Notification certificate file path
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
